title: Jerusalem Artichoke and Potato Soup
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 onion, chopped', '3 garlic cloves, chopped', '300g potatoes, peeled and diced', '200g Jerusalem artichokes, peeled and diced', '1L vegetable or chicken stock', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', 'grated nutmeg to taste']
